title: Melania Trump's Documentary Premiere: A Glimpse into First Lady Life
summary: Melania Trump, in her role as first lady, has produced a documentary titled 'Melania' that chronicles the 20 days leading up to her and husband Donald Trump's return to the White House. The film premiered at the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C., with the Trumps attending as VIPs. Melania stated that the documentary aims to reveal her life, including her business activities, philanthropy, family care, and team setup in the White House. Produced by AmazonMGM Studios with a reported budget of $40 million, it will have a global theatrical release on approximately 1,600 screens, followed by exclusive streaming on Amazon Prime Video. Director Brett Ratner noted that documentaries typically do not achieve high box office success, but the film's value lies in its content. The premiere attracted several Cabinet members, Congress representatives, and conservative commentators. Donald Trump praised the film for restoring a sense of glamour, while Melania emphasized its emotional and cinematic qualities, highlighting her multifaceted roles as a businessperson, wife, and mother during the transition.
